Body:
with codecs.open('testdata/models/routing_car_route_short.json', mode='r',
    encoding='utf-8') as f:
    expectedResponse = f.read()
responses.add(responses.GET,
    'https://route.ls.hereapi.com/routing/7.2/calculateroute.json',
    expectedResponse, status=200)
response = self._api.car_route([38.9, -77.04833], [39.0, -77.1])
expected_short_route = (
    'US-29 - K St NW; US-29 - Whitehurst Fwy; I-495 N - Capital Beltway; MD-187 S - Old Georgetown Rd'
    )
self.assertEqual(response.route_short, expected_short_route)
responses.activate
